mapper.update: update t_student_msg set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nativePlace = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idType = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idNunber = #{idNunber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentPhone = #{parentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folk = #{folk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, politicalSt = #{politicalSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, grade, sex, birthday, nativePlace, idType, idNunber, phone, parentPhone, folk, politicalSt from t_student_msg where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `name`, grade, sex, birthday, nativePlace, idType, idNunber, phone, parentPhone, folk, politicalSt from t_student_msg
